page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Employment within the whole of this area is mostly in the service industries with some in the primary industry of farming. Manufacturing industry is not much developed except in the area of High Brooms close to the railway. Here a small industrial estate, the Haslemere Estate, has been built (and is still being expanded) in what was the quarry for the High Brooms Brick and Tile Works which ceased production several years ago. The factories include many engaged in printing, some light engineering, car servicing works, depots for oil storage and parking areas for fleets of vans and lorries of local firms. There is also a large Cash and Carry and a shop selling building and decorating materials. When we surveyed the area there were many empty buildings waiting for a buyer.
